name: @sablier/solsab
description: Programs of the Sablier token distribution protocol for the Solana chain

scripts.lint: bun run fmt:rust:check && bun run lint:ts && bun run prettier:check
scripts.lint:fix: bun run fmt:rust && bun run lint:ts:fix && bun run prettier:write
scripts.t: bun run build && RUST_LOG=off bun run ts-mocha -t 1000000 --parallel tests/**/**/*.ts
scripts.t:debug: bun run build && RUST_LOG=debug bun run ts-mocha -t 1000000 --parallel tests/**/**/*.ts
scripts.t:only: bun run build && RUST_LOG=off bun run ts-mocha -t 1000000 tests/**/**/*.ts
scripts.t:only:debug: bun run build && RUST_LOG=debug bun run ts-mocha -t 1000000 tests/**/**/*.ts
scripts.t:lk: bun run build && RUST_LOG=off bun run ts-mocha -t 1000000 --parallel tests/lockup/**/*.ts
scripts.t:mi: bun run build && RUST_LOG=off bun run ts-mocha -t 1000000 --parallel tests/merkle_instant/**/*.ts
